name: Aviasport Club and Flight School
about: At Aviasport Club and Flight School, we offer personalized, hands-on instruction for all skill levels, helping you transform your dreams of flight into reality. Our comprehensive training program includes both theoretical and practical components, with 100 hours of theoretical instruction and at least 45 flying hours. Our experienced instructors train you on our Piper PA28 and Diamond DA-40 fleets, ensuring you develop the skills and knowledge to fly safely and confidently. With a minimum age of 16 to start training and a valid class 2 medical certificate required, we guide you through every step of becoming a licensed pilot. Join our club and embark on an enthralling journey to become a skilled aviator. The sky is calling, and adventure awaits
services:
["Air law
Principles of flight
Flight performance and planning
Operational procedures
Human performance
Communications
Meteorology
Navigation
Aircraft General Knowledge"]
